JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Overview    This position involves development of software applications, modules, libraries, and tools for configuration, operation, and management of the base station. The team targets its solutions for multi-server, multi-core, real time networked Linux and embedded platforms that generate a rich set of diagnostic data used in system verification. Development will be done in C/C++ and Python.     The base station program provides internal solutions for prototyping and verifying of the latest modem technologies. Projects within this program currently provide solutions in 5G NR, 4G LTE, IoT, and C-V2X standards. Product teams are comprised of multiple disciplines (Software, Test, Systems, and Hardware Engineers) providing custom designed, cutting edge, end-to-end solutions.     The ideal candidate will have experience in software application lifecycles, work collaboratively within a team, be capable of debugging and troubleshooting system level problems, and learn new technologies as needed.     All Qualcomm employees are expected to actively support diversity on their teams, and in the Company.
